message.content: {"given_definition_quality":95,"better_definition":"six months","sentence":"我在家半年。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animated scene: Inside a simple home, a person is sitting and looking thoughtfully at a large calendar. The calendar shows six months passing, with pages turning and seasonal changes visible outside the window—snow, sun, rain, flowers blooming—signifying the passage of half a year. Warm, gentle lighting, cozy interior, subtle futuristic ruin details outside, but inside peaceful and hopeful.","sentence_translation":"I am at home for half a year."}
